Adventurers' Guide:
I'm starting to get dissapointed. One final recap....
Hunt Hot Springs Bandersnatchlings, Hot Springs Buffaloes, Hot Springs Flavas, Hot Springs Atroxspawn, Hot Springs Antelopes, Hot Springs Nepentheses, Hot Springs Yetis, Hot Springs Atroxes, Hot Springs Bandersnatches, and Hot Springs Grendels, and collect 40 Hot Springs Water Samples. Once you've collected all the water samples, simply take them to Warehouse Keeper Walderal in the Town of Aden . Now get to it!
